about:
I am a professional web developer with over three years of hands-on experience in designing and developing responsive websites and web applications. I specialize in PHP and frameworks like Laravel, Symfony, and WordPress, delivering high-quality solutions for complex web projects. I am also proficient in front-end technologies such as React.js, Vue.js, and backend tools like Node.js and Python, ensuring seamless integration between design and functionality.

My deep passion for coding, paired with my ability to quickly analyze and meet customer requirements, guarantees efficient and reliable results that exceed client expectations. I also bring expertise in Shopify and Magento, allowing me to offer comprehensive e-commerce solutions. Iâ€™m committed to continuous learning, staying up-to-date with the latest industry trends and tools to deliver innovative web solutions.
